benchmark_details.name: NewsPaLM MBR and QE Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The first-ever release of a LLM-generated, MBR-decoded and QE-reranked dataset with both sentence-level and multi-sentence examples. It demonstrates that training on this dataset outperforms training on traditional web-crawled datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that outperforms existing web-crawled datasets in neural machine translation tasks.

data.source: Derived from the Newscrawl corpus released for the WMT evaluation campaigns.
data.size: About 2 million examples (combined sentence-level and blob-level)
data.annotation: Generated by MBR decoding and QE reranking methods using the PaLM-2 model.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model performance on various datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance on the respective evaluation metrics.
